LanguageData.Alien_Crystalloid.label: crystalloid
LanguageData.Alien_Crystalloid.description: Xenohuman race with crystalline skin and brains with a natural affinity for psycasting. Crystalloids have an unknown origin, with only a handful of traits that resemble anything from Earth (Despite the fact many other xenohuman races do). Inhabiting rimworlds on the edges of known space, Crystalloids are typically part of an ominous and mysterious psionic faction called the "Collective". Crystalloids can live for an extremely long time.

LanguageData.Alien_CrystalValkyrie.label: valkyrie
LanguageData.Alien_CrystalValkyrie.description: Xenohuman variant race, born from Crystalloids from unknown conditions. Valkyries are a strong, combat oriented, and carnivorous all-female race with the same psionic capabilities as Crystalloids. Valkyries are hated by the Crystalloid Collective, who actively seeks to exterminate them. The ones who flee from the clutches of the Collective often find refuge in human communities.
